title: Which song is played in end credits of episode 5 (season 1) in TVF? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's one of my favorite most inspirational songs..Written and Music by Vaibhav Bundhoo.. He's also the cinematographer of TVF Pitchers (shot and edited the whole series) and also active on Quora..The name of the song which you are looking for is "One Step At A Time"The video was put on YouTube on 8th of July after the S01E02 was uploaded on their channel.All the tracks of TVF play will be soon uploaded on their site, although they haven't committed any dates..Truly, Vaibhav is a gem of TVF.. TVF rocks..It's one of few best things happened to YouTube! Here you go:

Hi there the song you listen in the end of girls hostel season one 5th episode is written and sung by vaibhav bundhoo its called Oh life , but he hasn't official released it yet so stay tuned into girlyapa channel as they will be uploading all songs in their series but when they will evin i don't know even i am waiting very despirately so sit back and relax.
